quotes.quote: This only is denied to God: the power to undo the past.
quotes.author: Agathon

quotes.quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Look not mournfully into the past. It comes not back again. Wisely improve the present. It is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future, without fear.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: I tend to live in the past because most of my life is there.
quotes.author: Herb Caen

quotes.quote: The farther behind I leave the past, the closer I am to forging my own character.
quotes.author: Isabelle Eberhardt

quotes.quote: We can draw lessons from the past, but we cannot live in it.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Time is just something that we assign. You know, past, present, it's just all arbitrary. Most Native Americans, they don't think of time as linear; in time, out of time, I never have enough time, circular time, the Stevens wheel. All moments are happening all the time.
quotes.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess

quotes.quote: Live neither in the past nor in the future, but let each day's work absorb your entire energies, and satisfy your widest ambition.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler

quotes.quote: I don't think of the past. The only thing that matters is the everlasting present.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Events in the past may be roughly divided into those which probably never happened and those which do not matter.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge
